version_description: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Surprise Boxes! Win cues, coins and mini games!
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Collect rings and play in the new tournaments!
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Collect rings and play in the new tournaments!
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* New feature available! The top table now gets tougher and more fun with the addition of the “Cushion Shot on 8 Ball“ rule. Can you still be the best and take on the top talent?
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* New feature available! The top table now gets tougher and more fun with the addition of the “Cushion Shot on 8 Ball“ rule. Can you still be the best and take on the top talent?
* NEW Spin&Win is now available with a fresh look and much better PRIZES!
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

- New feature - Avatars! Customize your profile with new, awesome Avatars and bring your own personality to the tables. Dust off your cue and let's play!
- Bug fixes and general improvements.

- New feature - Avatars! Customize your profile with new, awesome Avatars and bring your own personality to the tables. Dust off your cue and let's play!

- Bug fixes and general improvements.

- See when your friends are online! Check the leaderboard or your friends menu, find who’s online, and challenge them!
- Get notified when your friends log on for a game! Time to show them who’s the Pool Legend!
- Bug fixes and general improvements.

- New temporary events available soon!
- A special tournament only this Christmas!

*Play the AWESOME New Game Mode!*
9 Ball Pool is here! 9 Ball Pool is a new game mode with new rules. Just select your entry fee and enjoy this fast paced 1 on 1 game!
Don’t miss out on the 9 Ball Pool craze, check it out now
*Who’s BETTER?*
Now you can keep track of your lifetime score against your friends! Play now and show your friends who is the best!
*iMessage Play!*
8 Ball Pool is now live on iMessage App! Just update and add 8 Ball Pool to your iMessage drawer to play with your friends. Try it out now!
Plus experience smoother gameplay from bug fixes and general improvements!
Update and play now!

Update and play now!

Update and check out our newest update which includes many fan requests!

- New Chat! Now you can say anything to your Facebook friends!
- Challenge your friends to a game of 9 Ball or No Guideline matches!
- Raise the stakes! Now you can pick a new city in rematches with Friends!
- NEW 9 BALL Game Modes: Play 9 Ball with No Guidelines, Calling Pockets to All Shots and in Tournaments!
- NEW RULES: check out the revamped Cairo, Shanghai and Rome Tiers!
- NEW Beijing Tier: play No Guidelines with any bet!
- General improvements and bug fixing.

The new 8 Ball Pool update is here!
- Challenge more friends with the new Friends of Friends feature. Check it on the Play with Friends!
- Surprise Boxes are now bigger and better than ever! Check out the new Legendary Cues with greater rewards.
- Performance improvements and bug fixing.

- Sleigh this holiday season with an exciting new update! We’ve added holiday themed events & a fantastic new Lobby. Update now to join in all the fun!

- Introducing New Victory Boxes: Unlock these Power Packed Rewards when you win a match.
- You asked, we heard… Now you can upgrade your Cues with More Force, Better Aim, Extra Spin & Increased Time. Update your game today and start winning.

现在，将你的乡野球杆级为胜利球杆。没错，将你的乡野球杆属性升级到最高，即可开启你的胜利之旅！
我们还为胜利宝箱和惊喜宝箱增加了全新炫酷动画。这还不是全部，我们还增加了全新球杆商店。
立即更新你的游戏，体验全新功能和其他改进。

- Play the game you love in your native language. Introducing Indonesian as new supported language!
- This update includes improvements that will provide you with a better gaming experience. We constantly strive to make our games better, so your feedback is always welcome. Thank you for playing 8 Ball Pool!

- Play the game you love in your native language. Introducing Indonesian as new supported language!
- This update includes improvements that will provide you with a better gaming experience. We constantly strive to make our games better, so your feedback is always welcome. Thank you for playing 8 Ball Pool!

Introducing Pool Clubs!
The most requested feature just landed in 8 Ball Pool - Clubs! Join Clubs with your friends, meet new players, and compete against other Clubs for the biggest ever rewards!

- Join a Club or create your own!
- Invite friends to your Club!
- Play and Win to increase your Club’s earnings!
- Win rewards every week for the top positions in your League, Country and the World Leaderboards!
- Play and climb up the Club Leagues every week! Reach the Diamond League to become the ultimate Club in 8 Ball Pool!
- Make new friends with the open Clubs chat!
- Need coins? Donate and request free gift boxes in Club chat!
- Challenge anyone in your Club and find out who’s the best!

查看更加优质的全新礼品，以赠送给你的俱乐部好友！

使用一大全新的免费表情符号打个招呼，或者让你的对手败下阵来！

8 Ball Pool 现已推出了全新迷你游戏——Lucky Shot！证明你的技能，获取丰厚的奖励！还有更多精彩......感觉手气不错的玩家，可以尝试 Golden Shot 来获取更丰厚的奖励！
现在立即更新游戏，畅玩这个精彩纷呈的新功能！

是否已准备好迎接假期？该好好准备啦！我们热忱地推出了全新的《8 Ball Pool》更新！

• 我们添加了以假期为主题的活动，其中包括全新的假期连胜活动。切莫错过！即将推出......

• 我们还进行了一些调整并解决了一些讨厌的错误，为了你的娱乐体验，让《8 Ball Pool》更加流畅！
立即下载最新更新，获取新内容！是时候来一局了！

新的《8 Ball Pool》更新现在推出了！

你最喜欢的球杆现在可以升级了！密切关注即将推出的优惠，并开始收集碎片吧！
我们还进行了一些调整并解决了一些讨厌的错误，为了你的娱乐体验，让《8 Ball Pool》更加流畅！
立即下载最新更新，获取新内容！是时候来一局了！

Pool Pass：赛季1现已推出！
赢得比赛并完成每日任务以提升排名，并赢得越来越多的奖励！
获取Pool Pass以解锁独家奖励，并以两倍的速度打开胜利宝箱！

在这个新版本中，玩家将能够继续连胜活动中的进度，而不是只能重新开始。

8 Ball Pool在六月庆祝10周年纪念，首次推出带有动画的进化版球杆！
铋质球杆推出！它以稀有矿石为基础，会随着你统计属性的升级而变化。注意球杆的最大等级，届时它会华丽变身！
在整个六月，你可以在参与所有的生日活动：Pool Pass、Win Streak、Spin & Win、特殊任务、奖励、平常任务等等时收集球杆部件！
